amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Andean Counterdrug Initiative by $100 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $100 million, the bill's $735 million for the Andean Counterdrug Initiative (Plan Colombia).

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 329).
